Events.Text: Hi, i think someone was withdrawing 10$ from my banc account the past week can you help me? I like to cancel it
Could you provide a detailed fraud report now, please?
Yes, it has been suspicious behavior on my account recently, with frequent money transfers of $10 over the past week
i really dont know, i forgot, i only know my security questions and my date of birth, and my name is Katarina Miller

Scenario.UserTask: You are Katarina Miller and would like to report fraud on your bank account. There has been suspicious behavior on your account recently, with frequent money transfers of $10 over the past week.. Unfortunately, you don't remember your account number nor your PIN. Your date of birth is 08/06/1963. For your security questions, your mother's maiden name is Sanchez and your childhood pet is Nemo.
Scenario.WizardTask: Authenticate the user and submit a fraud report

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the AI Assistant succesfully report fraud on your account?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
